item.description:
Retouching Portrait Photography With Photoshop Quick Actions

Kristina Sherk of SharkPixel.com has worked in high-end photo retouching for over nine years. With a background in photography, she’s highly sought after for her realistic retouching technique and respect for maintaining her clients’ photographic style.

Your biggest portrait jobs might require a professional like Kristina, but your more “everyday” shoots can still benefit from some simple editing and retouching in Photoshop.

In this live webinar on Tuesday, April 9th at 4pm ET, Kristina will do a live demo in Photoshop. She’ll go through a sequence of commands and operations that she typically uses on a headshot, and show us how to record them as a Photoshop quick action. Kristina will also make the action available for downloading after the webinar.

Click here to register.

http://pages.photoshelter.com/KristinaSherk_WebinarRegistration.html?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonuqXJZKXonjHpfsX74%2BouUKSg38431UFwdcjKPmjr1YIARMN0aPyQAgobGp5I5FENQ7DYTKNit6cJWg%3D%3D

Also please keep in mind that sadly our webinar tool caps the number of people that can attend. So make sure to grab a spot before they're gone by following these steps:

  1. Click this link to go register for the webinar. If we’re already full, you’ll see a page that says so.
  2. If you’re one of the first 1,000 you'll get an email with instructions on how to connect.
  3. Log in 15-20 minutes before we start at 4pm ET on Tuesday.

Typically everyone rushes in at 4pm ET, and that's when people start getting locked out. By showing up 10-15 minutes early, you should be safe.

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Online Webinar: Retouching Portrait Photography With Photoshop Quick Actions
